//http://www.codechef.com/problems/PD13
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		long long n,c=1,a;
		cin>>n;
		if(n==1)
		cout<<"0"<<endl;
		else 
		{
			for(int i=2;i*i<=n;i++)
			if(n%i==0)
			{
				if(i==n/i)
				c+=i;
				else c+=i+n/i;
			}
			cout<<c<<endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
